message.body: Are you going to try to blast it out, or should I start digging? I would rather keep my line intact til it warms up so digging is easier and so I can use water and just shit in a bucket for a month til I can dig up and replace the line
I'm gonna think about it tomorrow when I'm in front of it
Ok I'm at home til about 330pm. And I'll be back around 6. I can put a key in my mailbox if no one is home
I think there is some sort of payment plans with the city and getting your sewer replaced, worth looking into
